analysis.description:
DQCoin.lockTime (/unique_chucks/5/0x578c7557d207e87e8232cd69d94f41a9a136a5fe.sol#98-105) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- _value > block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/5/0x578c7557d207e87e8232cd69d94f41a9a136a5fe.sol#100-105)

DQCoin.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/5/0x578c7557d207e87e8232cd69d94f41a9a136a5fe.sol#63)
ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/5/0x578c7557d207e87e8232cd69d94f41a9a136a5fe.sol#28-29)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/5/0x578c7557d207e87e8232cd69d94f41a9a136a5fe.sol:
